OOC:  I thought we had decided to limit the custom
factions this time to just ones who actually HAVE a
reason for existing that amounts to more than "I want
to kill all the other factions"  and now these Rouges
appear.

--- cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> "I have no idea," Jackie responds, puzzled.  "There
> wasn't anything 
> of value on my ship.  I must've cut them off at an
> intersection or 
> something - you know what road rage can do.  The
> screwy part was, I 
> didn't have a clue they were there until this ship
> just appears out 
> of nowhere and starts shooting at me.  I assumed
> they were pirates 
> 'cause the only identification on the ship was a big
> black skull."
> 
> He scratches his chin.  "Now that I think of it, I
> did manage to find 
> a match in my ship's database for that logo - a
> terrorist 
> organization that call themselves the Rogues. 
> Really nasty, by all 
> accounts."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...>
> wrote:
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > 
> > "Space pirates??"said Nightlight"what did they
> like of you?"
> 
>
